oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Animal health and welfare in organic European pig production: State of the art and challenges for the future, based on a Northwestern European questionnaire survey
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bonde, Marianne
Sørensen, Jan Tind
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sixty organic pig producers from Denmark, UK, the Netherlands, Germany, and Sweden have completed a questionnaire concerning health and welfare problems in organic sow herds. Half the farmers perceived they had a problem with piglet mortality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Bonde, Marianne and Sørensen, Jan Tind (2006) Animal health and welfare in organic European pig production: State of the art and challenges for the future, based on a Northwestern European questionnaire survey. Paper at: Organic Farming and European Rural Development, 30/5-31/5 2006.
